page.title: 06An Oil Depot-Great Bromley
page.content: Carless, Capel and Leonard were asked to invent a new fuel by Gottlieb Daimler, the car pioneer. They were the{first}company{to refine petroleum. Since the middle of the 19th century the oil industry has developed into a multi million pound international business.{East Anglia}has developed as a centre for agriculture and Industry which provides custom for the oil industry.Oil is{imported at Harwich, } where it is refined, then petrol is {stored}at depots like this one. The depot has{six tankers}for transporting the petrol.There are{21 } {staff}.{30 million litres}of petrol are sold each year to local farmers, schools,hospitals and domestic customers. The company is staffed by local people who can identify the local requirements.
